content.prompt: Complete the method sortArray in order to ascendingly sort the first count elements of an array of integers (arr). count and arr are given as parameters of sortArray (in that order).Instructions on how to solve this problem:-  Write a loop that goes from i=0 to i < count. -  For each value of i get the index of the smallest number in the array starting at i. -  Swap the array element at i with the element as indOfMin. In order to avoid losing any element while trying to swap pairs, you have to use an auxiliary temporal variable (for this, use the following lines of code temp = a; a=b; b = temp; in the same order).
